pr_title: App initialiser is called before default repository is created #8119

timeline.bodyText:
Could you write little bit more?
Many starters depend on ContentService avaialbe only when default cms repo is fully initialized. Starting from 7.3 Initialization happens in ProjectService, so we need a dependency.
timeline.author: rymsha
